item.description:
Join us for huge portions of authentic Northeastern Brazilian cuisine at reasonable prices. This is also a great opportunity to practice your Portuguese.

Thanks to Joana, the ultimate organizer, I had a wonderful Portuguese dining experience at Muqueca. Delicious food and outstanding service. I thought it would be great to add another meetup here.

Muqueca Restaurant is located in the charming neighborhood of Inman Square, less than a thirty minute walk from the major universities. It has a small family-style ambiance offering an authentic menu from the region of Espirito Santo, where seafood such as fish and shrimp flavored with cilantro, annatto seeds, and olive oil are cooked with the freshest and purest ingredients in a huge clay pot.

Here's a link with the menu, http://www.muquecares...

For manageable conversations, we'll sit at tables of six or less. You're welcome and encouraged to table hop

RSVP EARLY because seating is limited.

MBTA:
Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route.

DRIVING DIRECTIONS:
Check out Google to plan your driving route

PARKING:
Very limited parking at meters along Cambridge Street.

Please PLEASE Please answer the questions, so our reservation is accurate and conversations are balanced. THANK YOU!Join us for huge portions of authentic Northeastern Brazilian cuisine at reasonable prices. This is also a great opportunity to practice your Portuguese.

item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Muqueca - Friday Night Dinner
